Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
model.Geometry
model.Triangle
public class Triangle extends Geometry
Triangle Class extends Geometry to represent a triangular shape. It provides methods for drawing the triangle, saving it to a database, loading it from a database, updating its data, and retrieving its type.
Author:
Kisal/Ravi Date: 26 January 2024

  • Constructor Details

    • Triangle

      public Triangle(int x, int y, int x2, int y2, int x3, int y3)
      Constructor to initialize the Triangle with its three points' coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the first point.
      y - y-coordinate of the first point.
      x2 - x-coordinate of the second point.
      y2 - y-coordinate of the second point.
      x3 - x-coordinate of the third point.
      y3 - y-coordinate of the third point.

    • saveToDatabase

      public void saveToDatabase(Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Saves the triangle geometry to the database. This method inserts the geometry type into the `geometries` table and stores the triangle-specific data (coordinates of the three points) into the `triangles` table.
      Specified by:
      saveToDatabase in class Geometry
      Parameters:
      conn - Database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL error occurs.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns the type of this geometry (i.e., "Triangle").
      Specified by:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
